author: ALICE
title: BOB...
text:
Bob you really need to stop following me around...
Haven't you realized by now that i do not like you very much.
In fact, i believe your current behaviour comes close to what one would call harrassment.
Please understand that you are violating my personal space.
Back off for once - or i'll get my lawyer involved...
